mapper.update:
UPDATE syLog
id = #{id},
uid = #{uid},
idMaCompany = #{idMaCompany},
uidMaUser = #{uidMaUser},
nameMaUser = #{nameMaUser},
codeMaRole = #{codeMaRole},
nameMaRole = #{nameMaRole},
name = #{name},
idOpProUnit = #{idOpProUnit},
nameOpProUnit = #{nameOpProUnit},
idOpWorkOrder = #{idOpWorkOrder},
nameOpWorkOrder = #{nameOpWorkOrder},
idChecker = #{idChecker},
nameChecker = #{nameChecker},
idLeader = #{idLeader},
nameLeader = #{nameLeader},
dateExpect = #{dateExpect},
hoursExpect = #{hoursExpect},
listOpWorkOrderEmployee = #{listOpWorkOrderEmployee},
listOpDevice = #{listOpDevice},
listOpWorkOrderEmployeeHours = #{listOpWorkOrderEmployeeHours},
hoursTotal = #{hoursTotal},
countOpCardApply = #{countOpCardApply},
countOpCardSend = #{countOpCardSend},
description = #{description},
dateCreated = #{dateCreated},
dateGrouped = #{dateGrouped},
dateTaken = #{dateTaken},
dateOptioned = #{dateOptioned},
dateReturned = #{dateReturned},
dateInputted = #{dateInputted},
atcion = #{atcion},
log = #{log},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
tag = #{tag},
createUser = #{createUser},
createDate = #{createDate},
createIp = #{createIp},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
